message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, you can follow!
You're not getting all the cake, I'll take a bigger slice this time!
You're getting smaller and smaller, I'm getting bigger and bigger!
I'll give you a bigger share, but don't expect me to go down without a fight!
You're running out of options, take it or leave it!
I'll give you the majority, but I'm not going down without a fight!
